name: MBA Trading Group
tag_list: wholesale-electronics, swap-meets-in-california, department-store-returns-wholesale-cosmetics-electronics-pallets-customer-returns-liquidators-in-los-angeles, closeout-sales, closeouts-and-liquidators, surplus-merchandise, salvage-merchandise, overstock-m
overview:
MBA Trading is a Wholesale Supplier of Closeout, Overstock and Customer Return Merchandise, Our company is Family owned and has been in the salvage business since 2008.

We purchase merchandise from Major Department stores and different vendors. Our buying power allows us to purchase large volumes in order to receive discounted pricing that allows us in turn to pass those discounts on to our customers. If you sell on EBay or at a Flea Market, Swap Meet, Discount Store or are a wholesaler we can provide you with great merchandise at fraction of its original cost.

Our goal at MBA Trading is to provide great Customer Service. We looking forward to having a long term relationship with our customers not just one time deals. We supply small and big customers local and nationwide and internationally with a variety of different merchandise but always we treat each customer with great Customer Service regardless of their buying ability.
